title: Strengthening CS Competency in Practical Skills: Microlearning Course Based on Breastfeeding Physiology Animation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in physiology and nursing
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: One can accurately understand physiological processes through a 3D animation explaining the mechanisms of breast milk secretion and lactation.
One can analyze and explain the biochemical actions at each stage of milk production and secretion using visual materials.
One can apply the principles of lactation-related hormones (prolactin, oxytocin) to real clinical cases.
Learners can recall learning content with over 80% accuracy through interactive quizzes provided in a mobile environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
